params.name: vocab_size
params.description: Vocabulary size of the UDOP model. Defines the number of different tokens that can be represented by theinputs_ids passed when calling UdopForConditionalGeneration.

params.name: d_model
params.description: Size of the encoder layers and the pooler layer.

params.name: d_kv
params.description: Size of the key, query, value projections per attention head. The inner_dim of the projection layer willbe defined as num_heads * d_kv.

params.name: d_ff
params.description: Size of the intermediate feed forward layer in each UdopBlock.

params.name: num_layers
params.description: Number of hidden layers in the Transformer encoder and decoder.

params.name: num_decoder_layers
params.description: Number of hidden layers in the Transformer decoder. Will use the same value as num_layers if not set.

params.name: num_heads
params.description: Number of attention heads for each attention layer in the Transformer encoder and decoder.

params.name: relative_attention_num_buckets
params.description: The number of buckets to use for each attention layer.

params.name: relative_attention_max_distance
params.description: The maximum distance of the longer sequences for the bucket separation.

params.name: dropout_rate
params.description: The ratio for all dropout layers.

params.name: layer_norm_epsilon
params.description: The epsilon used by the layer normalization layers.

params.name: initializer_factor
params.description: A factor for initializing all weight matrices (should be kept to 1, used internally for initializationtesting).

params.name: feed_forward_proj
params.description: Type of feed forward layer to be used. Should be one of relu or gated-gelu. Udopv1.1 uses thegated-gelu feed forward projection. Original Udop uses relu.

params.name: is_encoder_decoder
params.description: Whether the model should behave as an encoder/decoder or not.

params.name: use_cache
params.description: Whether or not the model should return the last key/values attentions (not used by all models).

params.name: pad_token_id
params.description: The id of the padding token in the vocabulary.

params.name: eos_token_id
params.description: The id of the end-of-sequence token in the vocabulary.

params.name: max_2d_position_embeddings
params.description: The maximum absolute position embeddings for relative position encoding.

params.name: image_size
params.description: The size of the input images.

params.name: patch_size
params.description: The patch size used by the vision encoder.

params.name: num_channels
params.description: The number of channels in the input images.
